trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you like a new item in Instapaper.
This Trigger fires every time you create a comment on Instapaper.
This Trigger fires every time you highlight an item on Instapaper.
This Trigger fires every time you archive an item on Instapaper.
This Trigger fires every time you save a new item to Instapaper.
This Trigger fires every time you move an item to the folder you specify.
